lead_paragraph: REED--Dolores, died peacefully at her Wellington, FL home on December 29, 2015 surrounded by her family. She was a devoted wife for 66 years to her husband, Howard, a loving mother to her children, Janet and Rob, their spouses Dan and Julie, and her grandchildren, Lindsay, Ben, and Michael. Funeral services will be held on Sunday, January 3rd at 10am at Gutterman-Warheit Memorial Chapel at 7240 North Federal Highway, Boca Raton, FL. A graveside service will be on Wednesday, January 6, 2016 at 11am at the Beth David Cemetery, 300 Elmont Rd, Elmont, NY. 1/3
